sentences.cn: …一个靠自己奋斗成功的爱尔兰裔美国房地产大亨。

sentences.en: Are you the next oil tycoon?
sentences.cn: 你是下一位石油业界的大亨 吗 ?

sentences.en: Golf tycoon Tiger Woods, who pulled in $ 100 million, ranks second.
sentences.cn: 高尔夫名将“老虎”泰格·伍兹以1亿美元的收入位居第二.

sentences.en: If I were a tycoon, I would invest more money on e - commerce .
sentences.cn: 如果我是大款, 我会投资很多资金在 电子商务 里.

sentences.en: Most Hong Kong tycoon families keep a lower profile.
sentences.cn: 香港富豪家族大多行事低调.

sentences.en: One big deal made the young tycoon.
sentences.cn: 一笔大生意造就了这位年轻大亨.

sentences.en: The dead tycoon's sons will remain in their plush offices overseeing the death throes of the family empire.
sentences.cn: 这位已故大亨的儿子们将坐在豪华的办公室里，目睹这个家族帝国崩溃前的痛苦挣扎。

sentences.en: The high - salaried manager replaced the business tycoon.
sentences.cn: 高薪经理取代了企业巨头.

sentences.en: The high - salaried manager replaced the swaggering tycoon.
sentences.cn: 高薪的经理代替了趾高气扬的大老板.

sentences.en: The producer of that television show is a well - known business tycoon.
sentences.cn: 该节目的制作人是一位 知名 的商界大亨.

sentences.en: The self - made tycoon was about the secret of his success.
sentences.cn: 那位靠 自我 奋斗发了财的大亨正在夸耀他成功的秘诀.

sentences.en: The tycoon has many servants to minister to his needs.
sentences.cn: 那位大亨有很多人服侍他.

sentences.en: The tycoon is on the verge of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 那名大亨濒临破产的边缘.

sentences.en: This means share of market of this chip tycoon anabiosis had ended.
sentences.cn: 这象征着这个芯片巨子市场份额的苏醒已经竣事.

sentences.en: This young lady is the successor to the tycoon.
sentences.cn: (这位年轻女士是这位大亨的继承人. )

trans.tran_cn: <日><史>大君，将军，<口>企业巨头，大亨
trans.tran_en: someone who is successful in business or industry and has a lot of money and power
